Flyer

As part of the project, we produced a flyer explaining what we found.

Images from the flyer are below - please do not use without our permission and full attribution.

If you use a screen-reader, or can not see the images, the full explanation of what we found is on the Our Findings page.

Want to distribute some paper copies? Tweet us and we can send you some!

Port My Data

Information on what we found when we exercised our right to data portability under Article 20 GDPR, and details on how you can try to exercise the right too.
